About.firstParagraph: I am the son of Mexican immigrants. I grew up in Astoria, NY until 2010. After that, I moved to Mexico with my family where I spent the next 6 years living in Oaxaca - going to school and experiencing everyday life there. At the age of 16 in 2015 - I decided to make the jump and achieve the American Dream and move to NYC. I finished high school there and in 2021 - midst pandemic - I graduated from Hunter College with a B.S. in Computer Science.
